references: A. Fletcher, J. C. P. Miller, L. Rosenhead and L. J. Comrie, An Index of Mathematical Tables. Vols. 1 and 2, 2nd ed., Blackwell, Oxford and Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 1962, Vol. 1, p. 55.

N. J. A. Sloane, Notes on A984 and A2420-A2424
formula: a(n) = sum[ m=0..n ] binomial(n, m) K_m(8), where K_m(x)=K_m(n, 2, x) is a Krawtchouk polynomial - abarg(AT)research.bell-labs.com (Alexander Barg).a(n) ~ 105*4^(n-2)/(sqrt(Pi)*n^(9/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 28 2013a(n) = (105/16)*4^n*GAMMA(-7/2+n)/(sqrt(Pi)*GAMMA(1+n)). - _Peter Luschny_, Dec 14 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
